results.text: He replied, 'You of little faith, why are you so afraid?' Then he got up and rebuked the winds and the waves, and it was completely calm.
results.reason: Jesus addressing the disciples' lack of faith during a storm.
results.reflection: When our faith is weak, we tend to be overcome by fear, but Jesus can calm any storm in our lives.

results.text: Immediately Jesus reached out his hand and caught him. 'You of little faith,' he said, 'why did you doubt?'
results.reason: Jesus rescuing Peter when his faith wavered while walking on water.
results.reflection: Even in moments of doubt, Jesus is always there to rescue us when we call out to Him.

results.text: He said to his disciples, 'Why are you so afraid? Do you still have no faith?'
results.reason: Jesus questioning the disciples' fear and lack of faith during a storm.
results.reflection: Fear and faith cannot coexist; choose to trust in Jesus even in the midst of life's storms.
